marvel.description: David Cannon was always a bully, so his mutant abilities naturally led him to a life of crime and petty thievery, until his constant defeat at the hands of the Hank Pym and the Wasp led him to create the Whirlwind identity.

name: Whirlwind
powersText: Use of two hardened tool-steel sawblades mounted on his wrists
throwing shuriken and razor sharp jacks
Ability to spin at subsonic speeds
focus air currents into a jet stream and a windscreen and create small tornadoes
